titleStmt.title: A letter from a scholler in Oxford-shire to his unkle a merchant in Broadstreet upon occasion of a book intituled, A moderate and most proper reply to a declaration, printed and published under His Majesties name, Decemb. 8. intended against an ordinance of Parliament for assessing &c. / sent to the presse by the merchant, who confesseth himselfe converted by it.

notesStmt.note: The "Moderate and most proper reply..." attributed to William Prynne--cf. NUC Pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
